home.text_base_description: We are d to present for sale the mixed use apartment building located at 601 S. Van Ness Ave. The property is in the vibrant Mission District, with close proximity to a number of the San Francisco's top employers including Twitter, Uber, Pinterest, Square, and AirBnB. City Hall and many other government buildings are also just down the road. The Mission District also features many options for grocery shopping, dining, and nightlife with the main retail corridors of Mission St, Valencia St, and Guerrero St just a block away. 601 S. Van Ness Ave has convenient access to Highway 101 and Highway 280, while also providing residents with many nearby public transportation options. 601 S. Van Ness Ave is a 4,600 square feet building featuring two 3 bedroom flats, two 1 bedroom apartments, and one corner commercial space. Three of the units have been recently renovated. This building is not on the Mandatory Soft Story Retrofit List.

home_facts.Property_Type: Mixed Use, 2 Stories, Mixed Use, 5-15 Units
